SongLyrics.JpnStr: 馬鹿[ばか]みたい 子供[こども]なのね
SongLyrics.EngStr: You look like a fool, you're like a child

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夢[ゆめ]を追[お]って傷[きず]ついて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Chasing dreams and getting hurt

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嘘[うそ]が下手[へた]なくせに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though you're bad at lying

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 笑[わら]えない笑顔[えがお]見[み]せた
SongLyrics.EngStr: You showed me a smile that couldn't laugh

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 'I love you'も 碌[ろく]に言[い]わない
SongLyrics.EngStr: You can't even say 'I love you' properly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 口下手[くちべた]で本[ほん]真[ま]に不器用[ぶきよう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: You're tongue-tied and truly clumsy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なのになのにどうして
SongLyrics.EngStr: And yet, why

SongLyrics.JpnStr: サヨナラは言[い]えたの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Could you say goodbye?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だめだね だめよ だめなのよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's no good, it's no good, it's no good

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あんたが 好[す]きで好[す]きすぎて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I love you, I love you too much

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どれだけ 強[つよ]いお酒[さけ]でも
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how strong the drink

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 歪[ゆが]まない思[おも]い出[で]が 馬鹿[ばか]みたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: The memories that won't fade are foolish

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 馬鹿[ばか]みたい 本当[ほんとう]バカね
SongLyrics.EngStr: You look like a fool, really a fool

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あんた信[しん]じるばかりで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Only believing in you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 強[つよ]い女[おんな]のふり 切[せつ]なさの夜風[よかぜ]浴[あ]びる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Pretending to be a strong woman, bathing in the sad night breeze

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一人[ひとり]に成[な]って 3年[ねん]が過[す]ぎ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Three years have passed since being alone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 街並[まちな]みさえも 変[か]わりました
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the townscape has changed

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なのになのにどうして
SongLyrics.EngStr: And yet, why

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 未練[みれん]だけ置[お]き去[ざ]り
SongLyrics.EngStr: Only lingering regrets were left behind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 本[ほん]真[ま]に 碌[ろく]な男[おとこ]やない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Really, he's no good

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 揃[そろ]いの指輪[ゆびわ] 外[はず]します
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm taking off our matching rings

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ざまあみろ 清[せい]々[せい]するわ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Serves you right, I feel relieved

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いい加減[かげん] 待[ま]ってても 馬鹿[ばか]みたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: Waiting for you endlessly is foolish

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だめだね だめよ だめなのよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's no good, it's no good, it's no good

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あんたが 好[す]きで好[す]きすぎて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I love you, I love you too much

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どれだけ 強[つよ]いお酒[さけ]でも
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how strong the drink

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 歪[ゆが]まない思[おも]い出[で]が 馬鹿[ばか]みたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: The memories that won't fade are foolish

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 本[ほん]真[ま]に 碌[ろく]な男[おとこ]やない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Really, he's no good

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 揃[そろ]いの指輪[ゆびわ] 外[はず]します
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm taking off our matching rings

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ざまあみろ 清[せい]々[せい]するわ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Serves you right, I feel relieved

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんなのよ この涙[なみだ] 馬鹿[ばか]みたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: What are these tears, they're foolish

ListVocab: ざまあみろ-ざまあみろ
